mapper.select: SELECT seq, name, gender, btd, iD, passWord, delNy, admSignin, mobileCarrier, phoneNumber FROM userUi WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT a.seq, a.iD, a.passWord, a.name FROM userUi a WHERE 1=1 AND a.iD = #{iD} AND a.passWord = #{passWord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userUi ( seq, name, gender, btd, iD, passWord, delNy, mobileCarrier, phoneNumber, admSignin, regDateTime ) values ( #{seq}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{btd}, #{iD}, #{passWord}, #{delNy}, #{mobileCarrier}, #{phoneNumber}, #{admSignin}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE userUi SET name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, btd = #{btd}, iD = #{iD}, passWord = #{passWord}, delNy = #{delNy}, mobileCarrier = #{mobileCarrier}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, modDateTime = now() WHERE seq = #{seq}
UPDATE userUi SET delNy = 1, modDateTime = now() WHERE seq = #{seq}
